Column

Column description

Code

Code of the additional feature.

Is enabled

The status of the additional feature for all users or user groups.

Is enabled for current user

The status of the additional feature for current user.

Source

Source of the additional feature.

Available values

DbFeatureProvider

Records of the [Feature] database table.

web.config

Boolean key values from the <appSettings> section of the Web.config file in Creatio root directory.

Metadata

Additional features added in the source code using the class that inherits from FeatureMetadata.

GlobalAppSettings

Boolean properties of the Terrasoft.Core.GlobalAppSettings class. Learn more: .NET class reference.

The types of additional feature source are sorted by priority in descending order.

Description

Description of the additional feature.
